level.heading: Issuance of duplicate congressional tags.
level.text: Each Senator, member of the House of Representatives, and other individual who is authorized by law to be issued a congressional tag for his automobile shall, upon application therefor, be entitled to be issued a duplicate tag bearing the same number.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Aug. 5, 1977, 91 Stat. 684, Pub. L. 95-94, title IV, ยง 410.)
